bug.author: apc999
bug.summary: NoSuchMethodError in when using alluxio-yarn.sh script
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug NoSuchMethodError is thrown on running alluxio yarn integration, as following: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1413748/62559372-b6b80e00-b82f-11e9-9830-023927b83da1.png></denchmark-link>
This is an issue reported from the community slack channel at <denchmark-link:https://alluxio-community.slack.com/archives/CEXGGUBDK/p1565059786138400>https://alluxio-community.slack.com/archives/CEXGGUBDK/p1565059786138400</denchmark-link>
To Reproduce Expected behavior This YARN integration should work for Alluxio 2.0.0 Urgency Medium Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apc999>@apc999</denchmark-link> not everyone reading this will have access to that slack link. Can you please put more details in the issue description?
Closing this issue due to inactivity. Please update and reopen it if you need more help.
